name: NATIONAL ASPHALT PAVEMENT ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association representing asphalt pavement producers and paving contractors.
sampleDescriptions:
Issues related to asphalt in the implementation of H.R. 22, the Fixing America's Surface Transportation (FAST) Act. 
Issues related to asphalt in the implementation of S. 612, the Water Infrastructure
Provisions related to pavement type selection in the FY18 THUD Appropriations Bill.
Issues related to pavement economics, sustainability, and life-cycle cost analysis for the asphalt industry.

Issues related to concrete check-off programs.
Issues related to H.R. 2, the Agriculture and Nutrition Act of 2018.
Issues related to airfield pavement technologies.
